author: chris-dollin
msg: Factored out the RDF/XML-ABBREV tests from TestXMLOutput.
Doing so meant that their inclusion name-by-name could be
replaced by a call to a trivial (and standard JUnit) suite method.

author: chris-dollin
msg: Extracted "utility" code for TestXMLFeatures out into
on doctype vs non-doctype code.) Also started simplifying
calls to `check` by adding factory methods to `Change`.

author: chris-dollin
msg: Refactored out some nested classes (to declutter).
